trans-unit.source: Wraps an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> whose execution is initialized by an event.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping di un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> la cui esecuzione viene inizializzata da un evento.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] It is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> that is used to handle an event; typically it can be raised from the host or by the runtime in response to a delay timer expiring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Si tratta di un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>che viene utilizzata per gestire un evento; in genere può essere generato dall'host o dal runtime in risposta a un timer di ritardo che scade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: EventDrivenActivity is inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; therefore, it is a sequence that has the additional restriction that the first activity should be an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity ereditato <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>, pertanto, è una sequenza che presenta un'ulteriore limitazione che la prima attività deve essere un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the EventDrivenActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: È il EventDrivenActivity un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, ovvero il EventDrivenActivity può contenere altre attività.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity, with some additional characteristics.
trans-unit.target: È simile al EventDrivenActivity il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>attività, con alcune caratteristiche aggiuntive.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: An EventDrivenActivity must have a parent that is either a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity deve disporre di un padre che sia un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The first child of an EventDrivenActivity activity must be an activity that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Il primo membro figlio di un'attività EventDrivenActivity deve essere un'attività che eredita da <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: All subsequent children can be activities of any type.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i figli successivi possono essere di qualsiasi tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> blocks and waits for the pending occurrence of some events, such as starting a timer or the arrival of a message.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>Blocca e attende l'occorrenza in sospeso di alcuni eventi, quali l'avvio di un timer o l'arrivo di un messaggio.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> finishes running and then all subsequent activities are executed.
trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica l'evento, il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>al termine dell'attività in esecuzione e quindi tutte le successive vengono eseguite.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contains an EventDrivenActivity, the EventDrivenActivity has some restrictions: - The EventDrivenActivity may contain one, and only one, activity of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>EventDrivenActivity, contiene il EventDrivenActivity presenta alcune restrizioni:-il EventDrivenActivity può contenere una sola, attività di tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> must be the first child activity.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>deve essere la prima attività figlia.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> cannot be in the event handler for a child activity and cannot be a child to the EventDrivenActivity if the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is not the first child.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>non può essere nel gestore per un'attività figlio e non può essere un elemento figlio di EventDrivenActivity se il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>non è il primo membro figlio.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: - As long as the first activity is the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, the event handler can contain any activities.
trans-unit.target: -Fino a quando la prima attività è il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, il gestore dell'evento può contenere qualsiasi attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: If an activity other than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is contained in EventDrivenActivity, that activity cannot have an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se un'attività diversa da <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>è contenuto in EventDrivenActivity, tale attività non può contenere un gestore eventi.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that supports event handling can be used inside the EventDrivenActivity but the activity cannot have event handlers attached to itself.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un'attività che supporta la gestione degli eventi può essere utilizzata all'interno di EventDrivenActivity ma l'attività non può contenere i gestori eventi associati a se stessa.

trans-unit.source: Another example is that the EventDrivenActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, but the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> itself cannot contain any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: Un altro esempio è che il EventDrivenActivity può contenere un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, ma la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>stesso non può contenere <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>classi.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-identified name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attività definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'attività dell'evento che guida la modifica.

trans-unit.source: The event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Attività dell'evento che guida la modifica.
